silicone_00_30.name: silicone_00_30
silicone_00_30.notes: Very soft silicone, good for delicate tissues. High friction may require lubrication.

silicone_00_50.name: silicone_00_50
silicone_00_50.notes: Medium softness silicone. Common choice for soft robotics.

tpu_soft.name: tpu_soft
tpu_soft.notes: Thermoplastic polyurethane. Lower friction, higher modulus than silicone.

hydrogel_soft.name: hydrogel_soft
hydrogel_soft.notes: Ultra-soft hydrogel. Excellent friction properties but very low modulus.
